meanings.definition: A heavily armed foot soldier in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent1: The hoplites marched in formation towards the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The hoplites protected the city with their shields and spears.
meanings.sent3: The hoplites tried to do a dance routine in their heavy armor, but it was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The hoplites stood like an unbreakable wall against the advancing army.
meanings.sent5: The hoplites' armor gleamed in the sunlight as they prepared for battle.

meanings.definition: A group of heavily armed foot soldiers in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent1: The king led his hoplites into battle with great courage.
meanings.sent2: The hoplites trained together to become a formidable fighting force.
meanings.sent3: The hoplites decided to have a picnic in the middle of the battlefield, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The hoplites moved as one, like a well-oiled machine on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The hoplites' unity was their greatest strength in times of war.
